# pipelines.data_science.nodes.evaluate_model { #src.anant_ai_839.pipelines.data_science.nodes.evaluate_model }

`anant_ai_839.pipelines.data_science.nodes.evaluate_model(regressor, X_test, y_test)`

Evaluates the trained model on the test dataset and logs the accuracy score.

Args:
    regressor: The trained logistic regression model.
    X_test: Testing features.
    y_test: Testing target.

Logs:
    The accuracy of the model on the test data.
